review: As a newbie member of the 'unplugged' generation, I purchased this with the sole purpose of watching HBO NOW on my plasma 1080p TV with digital surround sound instead of just on my PC.  Waiting on AMAZON to update the firmware to handle HBO NOW.  Once that happens, I'll be a happy camper.  The voice search works well and beats hunting around with a keyboard or controller button presses.  Note, this box is VERY small, about the size of two decks of playing cards laid side by side.  Which is a GOOD THING.  Why make monster boxes to take up space in our entertainment centers?  Simple hook up, took maybe 2 minutes to plug in and go.  Can handle wireless or hard-wired Internet.  Has HDMI jack and additionally has optical audio output for high-end sound amps.
